author: Warhammer
description:
Squadrons of new battle tanks and advanced automata are rolling off the lines ready to deploy in the Age of Darkness. You wouldn’t want to show your face at the next Magos conclave without a few new armoured assets in tow, would you? Just imagine the embarrassment. https://www.warhammer-community.com/en-gb/articles/ebyoa9rq/sunday-preview-heavy-armour-from-the-forges-of-mars/

title: This Week in Warhammer – March of the Mechanicum
